description:
During the battle at the Black Bulls’ hideout, the hideout suddenly changes its shape, and Gauche and the others are surprised by the mysterious figure that emerges from it. This was the identity of the rumored ghost that lived in the hideout. His name was Henry Legolant, and he was the true master of the mansion. Henry is able to change the mansion into any form he chooses and had been watching over the rest of the Black Bulls ever since Yami had given him a cloak. He fights alongside his precious friends to protect their home.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ムチャクチャな魔法戦
